vote.title: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for emergency generator repair and maintenance for citywide use - LJ Power, Inc., lowest responsible bidder of three - Estimated amount of $673,610 - Financing: General Fund ($257,475), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($299,980), Communication Services Fund ($43,085), Aviation Fund ($28,125), Storm Drainage Management Operations Fund ($20,260), Sanitation Operation Fund ($13,155), and Convention and Event Services Fund ($11,530)
vote.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for emergency generator repair and maintenance for citywide use - LJ Power, Inc., lowest responsible bidder of three - Estimated amount of $673,610 - Financing: General Fund ($257,475), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($299,980), Communication Services Fund ($43,085), Aviation Fund ($28,125), Storm Drainage Management Operations Fund ($20,260), Sanitation Operation Fund ($13,155), and Convention and Event Services Fund ($11,530)
